page.title: 16Events in Alfriston
page.content:
There are a number of events in Alfriston which take place each year. One of them is the fair. It is a village event which includes stalls and games run by villagers and takes place on the village green.
Morris dancers come to Alfriston 6 times a year. Everyone comes out of their houses to see them dance down the street.
An old tradition has been restarted again this year,the tug of war across the River Cuckmere. One team pulls from one bank and one from the other. The winner pulls the opposition in.
On Christmas Eve,Father Christmas visits all the houses in the village delivering presents.
